.featured ul&gt;li::before{color:#282828}.topics-menu{border-bottom:1px solid #d4d4d4;border-top:1px solid #d4d4d4;display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-flow:column wrap;flex-flow:column wrap;margin-bottom:30px;padding:30px 0}@media (min-width: 48rem){.topics-menu{-webkit-box-align:center;-ms-flex-align:center;align-items:center;-webkit-box-orient:horizontal;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-flow:row nowrap;flex-flow:row nowrap;padding-bottom:15px;padding-top:15px}}.topics-menu__title{color:#000;font-size:14px;font-weight:700;letter-spacing:0.03em;line-height:1.143;margin:0 0 30px;text-transform:uppercase;white-space:nowrap}@media (min-width: 48rem){.topics-menu__title{margin-bottom:0;margin-right:30px}}.topics-menu__list{display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;-webkit-box-flex:1;-ms-flex:1;flex:1;-webkit-box-orient:vertical;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-flow:column wrap;flex-flow:column wrap;list-style:none;margin:0;padding:0}@media (min-width: 48rem){.topics-menu__list{-webkit-box-orient:horizontal;-webkit-box-direction:normal;-ms-flex-direction:row;flex-direction:row}}.topics-menu__list&gt;li{-webkit-box-flex:1;-ms-flex:1;flex:1;margin-bottom:8px}.topics-menu__list&gt;li:last-child{margin-bottom:0}@media (min-width: 48rem){.topics-menu__list&gt;li{margin:4px 0 4px 15px}}.topics-menu__list&gt;li&gt;a{-webkit-box-align:center;-ms-flex-align:center;align-items:center;background-color:#FFF0F0;border-radius:38px;color:#DD2F32;display:-webkit-box;display:-ms-flexbox;display:flex;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;-webkit-box-pack:center;-ms-flex-pack:center;justify-content:center;letter-spacing:0.03em;line-height:1.1667;padding:12px;text-transform:uppercase}@media (min-width: 48rem){.topics-menu__list&gt;li&gt;a{height:38px;white-space:nowrap}}.topics-menu__list&gt;li&gt;a:hover,.topics-menu__list&gt;li&gt;a:focus{background-color:#333;color:#fff}
